column2:
"Guardian. I must ask something of you.
...It concerns Harriet."
"Until recently, I had thought she was enjoying her Christmas. Now, however, her face tells of something grave troubling her."

"クリスマスを存分に
楽しんでいるように見えるのだが……
ふとした瞬間に思い詰めた顔を見せる。"
"Anxiety is written in every line of her expression. Perhaps she has realized that we are \"Phantoms\"... That we are fleeting beings, fated to disappear, alike to morning dew."

"I wish I could do this myself, but alas...
I have not the courage to apprise my sister of our ephemeral nature, knowing the pain it will cause her."

"僕が支えることが出来れば良いが……
自分たちがいずれ消滅する幻の存在だと
妹を傷つけずに説明する自信がない。"

"Guardian... You must be the one.
Tell my sister what she must hear.
I am begging you."
